p: Blood pressure (BP) can be defined as the pressure exercise by blood inside the vessel walls. It is of two types: SBP (systolic blood pressure < 120 mmHg) and DBP (diastolic blood pressure < 80 mmHg). In Hypertension patient SBP increase upper than 140 mmHg or DBP elevateupperthan 90 mmHg. At present, 26.4% population of world suffered hypertension and it is predicted that in 2025 this rate would increase by 60%. Hypertension is mainly of two types (Fig. 1).
